update SF_TALK
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PATH = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CULPRIT_ID = #{culpritId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TALKOR = #{talkor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLACE = #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TALK_TIME = #{talkTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RECORD = #{record,jdbcType=CLOB},
DOCUMENT_ID = #{documentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECORDER = #{recorder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=CLOB},
FILE_PATH = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILE_PATH_NAME = #{filePathName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TALK_START_TIME = #{talkStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TALK_END_TIME = #{talkEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_FIRST_TALK=#{isFirstTalk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS_PRO=#{addressPro,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS_CITY=#{addressCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS_COUNTRY=#{addressCountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS_STREET=#{addressStreet,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS_DETAIL=#{addressDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SF_TALK set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PATH = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CULPRIT_ID = #{culpritId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TALKOR = #{talkor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLACE = #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TALK_TIME = #{talkTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RECORD = #{record,jdbcType=CLOB}, DOCUMENT_ID = #{documentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECORDER = #{recorder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=CLOB}, FILE_PATH = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_PATH_NAME = #{filePathName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TALK_START_TIME = #{talkStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TALK_END_TIME = #{talkEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_FIRST_TALK=#{isFirstTalk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS_PRO = #{addressPro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS_CITY = #{addressCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS_COUNTRY = #{addressCountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS_STREET = #{addressStreet,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS_DETAIL = #{addressDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

sql.if: AND exists ( select t3.id from (select * from sys_group start with id= #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id) t3 where c.GROUP_ID=t3.id)
